description: Find all polynomials with real coefficients satisfying given functional equation.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1987_a1
(f : Polynomial ℝ)
(hf : ∀ x : ℝ, f.eval x * f.eval (2*x^2) = f.eval (2*x^3 + x))
: f = 1 ∨ ∃ n : ℕ, f = (Polynomial.X^2 + 1)^n

description: Prove inequality involving arctan of consecutive integers.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1991_a1
: ∀ n : ℕ, n > 0 → Real.arctan (n + 1 : ℝ) - Real.arctan n < 1 / (n^2 + n + 1)

theorem putnam_1968_a1
: 22/7 - Real.pi = ∫ x in (0)..1, x^4 * (1 - x)^4 / (1 + x^2)

description: Determine value of product involving cubic roots.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1985_a1
: ∏ n in Finset.Icc 0 999, ((n : ℝ)^3 - 1) / ((n : ℝ)^3 + 1) = 2/3

description: Find area of region R defined by |x|-|y|<=1 and |y|<=1.
header:
import Mathlib
open MeasureTheory
abbrev putnam_1988_a1_solution : ℝ := 6
theorem:
theorem putnam_1988_a1
    (R : Set (Fin 2 → ℝ))
    (hR : R = {p | |p 0| - |p 1| ≤ 1 ∧ |p 1| ≤ 1}) :
    (volume R).toReal = putnam_1988_a1_solution

description: Determine all polynomials P with P(x^2+1) = P(x)^2+1 and P(0)=0.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1971_a2
    (P : Polynomial ℝ) :
    (P.eval 0 = 0 ∧ (∀ x : ℝ, P.eval (x^2 + 1) = (P.eval x)^2 + 1)) ↔ P ∈ putnam_1971_a2_solution

description: Prove f(n)=n for multiplicative strictly increasing f with f(2)=2.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1963_a2
(f : ℕ → ℕ)
(hfpos : ∀ n, f n > 0)
(hfinc : StrictMonoOn f (Set.Ici 1))
(hf2 : f 2 = 2)
(hfmn : ∀ m n, m > 0 → n > 0 → IsRelPrime m n → f (m * n) = f m * f n)
: ∀ n > 0, f n = n

description: Prove xy = f(x+y) - f(x-y) for specific sequence sum.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1966_a1
(f : ℤ → ℤ)
(hf : f = fun n : ℤ => ∑ m ∈ Finset.Icc 0 n, (if Even m then m / 2 else (m - 1)/2))
: ∀ x y : ℤ, x > 0 ∧ y > 0 ∧ x > y → x * y = f (x + y) - f (x - y)

description: Prove no points in punctured disk satisfy given polynomial equation.
header:
import Mathlib
open Metric Set EuclideanGeometry
theorem:
theorem putnam_1970_a2
(A B C D E F G : ℝ)
(hle : B^2 - 4*A*C < 0)
: ∃ δ > 0, ¬∃ x y : ℝ, x^2 + y^2 ∈ Set.Ioo 0 (δ^2) ∧
A*x^2 + B*x*y + C*y^2 + D*x^3 + E*x^2*y + F*x*y^2 + G*y^3 = 0

description: Prove existence of rationals r,s satisfying approximation conditions.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1968_a2
(a b c d e f : ℤ)
(ε : ℝ)
(hne : a * d ≠ b * c)
(hε : ε > 0)
: ∃ r s : ℚ, (|r * a + s * b - e| : ℝ) ∈ Set.Ioo 0 ε ∧ (|r * c + s * d - f| : ℝ) ∈ Set.Ioo 0 ε
